charinfo.name: ET Yondaime Kazekage (S)
charinfo.description: Edo Tensei Yondaime Kazekage (S) has been summoned to participate in the war. He will prioritize his village above all else while he is back.

abilities.name: Magnet Release
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Yondaime Kazekage (S) uses Magnet Release. For 4 turns he will ignore affliction damage and gain 25% damage reduction. Gold Dust Waterfall will deal an additional 10 damage during this skill.

abilities.name: Gold Dust Waterfall
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Yondaime Kazekage (S) uses Gold Dust Waterfall on one enemy dealing 45 piercing damage.

abilities.name: Gold Dust Shield
abilities.description: Edo Tensei Yondaime Kazekage (S) uses Gold Dust Shield on one ally. For 2 turns that ally will gain 50% damage reduction and be immune to affliction damage. All enemies will be dealt 10 damage for 2 turns when this skill is used*.

abilities.name: Gold Dust Manipulation
abilities.description: This skill makes ET Yondaime Kazekage (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
